keyPolicies.policyDescription: So we can afford the public services we all need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Securing investment in Cardiff's railway lines and championing faster broadband across the city
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in Cardiff’s infrastructure for improved transportation and connectivity.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer pensions, more jobs, and more security for families across Cardiff
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Enhance financial stability and job security for families in Cardiff.

issues.economy: Job total hits record high while wages surge. Tax cuts for workers and savers. A better future for you, your family and Wales. Britain can't afford it, and you'll have to pay for it with Labour
issues.governance: Labour risks £170bn extra debt. More debt. Labour's Scottish alliance
